title: BRIEF-India's Tata Global Beverages Sept-Quarter Consol Net Profit Falls
text:
BRIEF-India's Tata Global Beverages Sept-Quarter Consol Net Profit Falls

Stock Markets 14 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 17:48)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Tata Global Beverages Sept-Quarter Consol Net Profit Falls Oct 30 (Reuters) - Tata Global Beverages Ltd : * SEPT-QUARTER CONSOL NET PROFIT 1.38 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 1.7 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * SEPT-QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 18.34 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 17.61 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO

BRIEF-India's Tata Global Beverages Sept-Quarter Consol Net Profit Falls
